cards.rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, search your library for an artifact creature card with mana value 6 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Once each turn, after your second main phase, untap all artifact creatures you control. There is an additional combat phase where only artifact creatures can attack, followed by an additional main phase.
